subtitle: This colourful dish is full of flavour.

method.text: Place the apricots in a bowl. Leave to soak overnight in the orange juice.
Remove from juice and cut into slivers. Mix a little of the juice with the cornflour to form a paste. Reserve the remaining juice.
Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan. Add the garlic, ginger and duck. Fry for 3-4 min until well cooked. Remove with a slotted spoon and keep warm.
Add the peppers, carrot, courgettes and mange-tout to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 min. Stir the duck back into the pan and heat through for 2 min.

Add the apricot slivers to the pan with the bean sprouts and mango. Stir fry for 1 min. Stir in the cornflour paste with the remaining juice and soy sauce. Stir fry for 2 min until piping hot. Serve immediately.

title: Exotic duck and mango stir-fry
